Name: Statuette of a Woman Brewing Beer
Description: The statuette, made of three pieces of painted wood joined together, shows a woman standing in front of two large jars that are used for brewing beer. The woman has short hair and wears a short white kilt. She is straining the mash into a vat. It has a spout near the top to allow the fermenting beer to overflow or perhaps to let air into the vat to aid the fermentation process.
